title: Doctor Who - Tales from the TARDIS - Vol. 1 (MP3 CD) (.ISO)
description:
Tales from the TARDIS - Vol. 1 (MP3 CD) (.ISO)

This is an .iso of the MP3 CD release. If you don&#039;t know what an ".iso" file is or what to do with it, Google is your friend - use it  

Description:
Seven stories of excitement and adventure in distant times and places! This second volume of MP3-CD readings features: The Planet of the Daleks read by Jon Pertwee; Warriors of the Deep read by Peter Davison; Vengeance on Varos read by Colin Baker; The Novel of the Film read by Paul McGann; Earth and Beyond - three original short stories read by Paul McGann; For PC and Mac users, this MP3-CD also features a special TARDIS-themed viewer screen, images from the original series, excerpts from other Doctor Who CD releases, web links and additional features. The readings also feature incidental music from the original TV stories.
